reviewText: This is the best paintball documentary ever. Shows the triumphs and struggles of teamwork and friendship alike that you can't truly appreciate if you're not a real fan of paintball.

Best paintball movie of all time. I bought it a while back lost it, but bought another one keeping this one safe. Good story and shows the real struggle of being considered second best in the world of paintball.

You can not call yourself a paintballer if this DVD isn't in your collection. This documentary is one of the reasons I got into paintball. It shows the blood, sweat, and tears of what an actual paintball player goes through. Quite frankly this is the best DVD documentary on paintball you can get. You will not be disappointed.
